sentences.english: We lashed his ankles with cord.
sentences.chinese: 我们把他的足踝用细绳绑起来。

sentences.english: Objective To explore serratus anterior muscle transplantation for the repair of soft tissue defects in foot and ankle.
sentences.chinese: 目的应用前锯肌瓣修复足踝部软组织缺损。

sentences.english: The nurse will bind up Ed's sprained ankle.
sentences.chinese: 护士将用绷带包扎艾德扭伤的足踝。

sentences.english: Background Patients with diabetes mellitus may be at increased risk for infection following foot and ankle surgery.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病患者可能增加足踝部手术后感染的风险。

sentences.english: My ankles look puffy and they pit when I press them with my finger.
sentences.chinese: 我的足踝看起来浮肿，用手一按，就有小坑。

sentences.english: His ankles look puffy and they pit when he presses them with his finger.
sentences.chinese: 他的足踝好象肿了，用手按，就有小坑痕。

sentences.english: He gave a wrench to his ankle when he jumped down.
sentences.chinese: 他跳下去的时候扭伤了足踝。

sentences.english: My ankles look puffy and there are dents in the skin when I press them.
sentences.chinese: 我的足踝好像肿了，用手按，就有小坑痕。

sentences.english: She wore a white dress, which fell almost to her ankles.
sentences.chinese: 女孩身着一袭白裙，齐至足踝。

sentences.english: Sufficient ankle ministry and sufficient bottom achieve a face not to suit to apply local skin valve transfers repair.
sentences.chinese: 足踝部和足底部创面不适合施行局部皮瓣转移修复。

sentences.english: Out in Ukraine, Shevchenko suffers an ankle injury in training.
sentences.chinese: 舍甫琴科在乌克兰操练时弄伤了足踝。

sentences.english: The doctor told her to bathe her twisted ankle twice a day.
sentences.chinese: 医生嘱咐她每天浸泡扭伤的足踝两次。

sentences.english: My twisted ankle has swollen up to twice its usual size.
sentences.chinese: 我扭伤的足踝已肿得有平常的两倍大。

sentences.english: Human beings and all other animals that have feet and legs have ankles.
sentences.chinese: 人类和其他所有有脚腿的动物都有足踝。

sentences.english: His sprained ankle ruined his chances of winning the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 他扭伤了足踝，这断送了他赢得比赛的机会。
